abilities.desc: After you take damage from anything other than an Action or an Ability, choose one: You deal 1 damage to an enemy within range; -or- you heal 2.
abilities.trigger: after you take damage from anything other than an action or an ability

actions.name: Bad Luck
actions.desc:
Place X Traps into empty spaces within range.
Usable once per turn. X cannot be greater than 4.

actions.name: Karma
actions.desc:
Deal X damage and give 4 Weakness tokens to the active character. X is equal to the amount of HP you have lost this turn.
Usable once per turn. Usable only during enemy turns.
